Bash(bq --location=us-central1 query --use_legacy_sql=false --format=csv "
SELECT table_name
FROM \`bqx-ml.bqx_ml_v3_features.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES\`
WHERE table_name LIKE ''%eurusd%''
ORDER BY table_name
")
Bash(for table in agg_eurusd reg_eurusd mom_eurusd vol_eurusd der_eurusd align_eurusd)
Bash(do echo "Deleting: $table" bq rm -f bqx-ml:bqx_ml_v3_features.$table done)

Bash(git -C /home/micha/bqx_ml_v3 commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: V2 Roadmap - Enhanced Stacking Architecture (399 stable features)

Roadmap V2:
- Replaced naive SHAP with Robust Group-First Stability Selection
- Added 6 critical stacking fixes for persistence
- Feature selection complete: 399 stable features (168 IDX, 270 BQX)
- Target: 85-95% called accuracy with 30-50% coverage

Enhanced Stacking Architecture:
- Walk-forward OOF predictions (prevents meta-learner leakage)
- Probability calibration (Platt scaling before stacking)
- Regime-aware meta-learner (volatility, trend, session features)
- Feature-view diversity (different features per base model)
- Confidence gating (threshold-based called accuracy)
- Added ElasticNet as 4th base model for linear diversity

New Files:
- intelligence/roadmap_v2.json: Full V2 roadmap specification
- intelligence/robust_feature_selection_eurusd_h15.json: 399 stable features
- pipelines/training/feature_selection_robust.py: Group-first stability selection
- pipelines/training/stack_calibrated.py: Calibrated probability stacking
- pipelines/training/train_multi_pair.py: Scale to 28 pairs
- scripts/generate_column_catalog.py: Column catalog generator

Updated Intelligence:
- context.json: V2 architecture, new milestones
- ontology.json: Enhanced stacking model definition

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
